page.title: 08HOUSING ESTATES
page.content: I live on one of the housing estates in our area it is called THE RISE. Lots of people come to our estate the postman,the milkman and corona man.The estate is about 4 or 5 years old and still has not been finished there are lots of pieces of land you can buy to build on.Some of these plots have good views and you can see Trearddur Bay beach.Sometimes we see people having picnics on the grass at the far end of our estates.There is a road going down - you go over 2 stites , walk across a pipe and your on a beach.On the estate there is a big board saying what the houses are called , our house is called Dinam.
